'''Ash''' is a [[Jade-Eyed Cat]] and quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|The Adventurers' Guild's Affairs}}.

==Profile==
In ''The Adventurers' Guild's Affairs'', the [[Adventurers' Guild]] receives a commission to find a missing [[Jade-Eyed Cat|jade-eyed cat]], who is Ash. The [[Traveler]] is tasked to defeat a [[Stonehide Lawachurl]], eventually finding Ash nearby and then returns it to [[Lan]] back in [[Liyue Harbor]].

===Appearance===
Ash has the appearance of a typical [[Jade-Eyed Cat]].
